Name: Monsters
Ability: Keeps random unit card out after each round

Name: Nilfgaard
Ability: Wins any round that ends in a draw

Name: Northern Realms
Ability: Grants an extra card upon winning a round

Name: Scoia`tael
Ability: Decides who takes the first turn

Name: Skellige
Ability: Two random cards from the graveyard are placed on the battlefield at the start of the third round
